title: Special Counsel claims Trump misled his attorneys about classified docs: Sources
description: A federal judge ruled the special counsel has presented evidence that Donald Trump may have broken the law in his handling of classified documents, sources told ABC News.

title: 8 dolphins dead after washing ashore on New Jersey beaches
description: A pod of eight dolphins died after being stranded on beaches in New Jersey on Tuesday, according to an animal rescue and rehabilitation center.

title: Gwyneth Paltrow's trial over alleged 2016 ski crash begins: What to know
description: Gwyneth Paltrow is standing trial in court over an alleged ski crash that occurred in 2016. Here's what you need to know.

title: Gerber powdered infant formula voluntarily recalled due to possible bacteria exposure
description: Some of Gerber's Good Start SoothePro powdered infant formula products have been recalled due to possible bacterial contamination.

title: With Trump case looming, what is an indictment?
description: Legal experts say that criminal cases where a defendant is indicted long before an arrest are common in potential white-collar crimes.

title: Willis Reed, leader on Knicks' 2 title teams, dies at 80
description: Willis Reed, who dramatically emerged from the locker room minutes before Game 7 of the 1970 NBA Finals to spark the New York Knicks to their first championship and create one of sports’ most enduring examples of playing through pain, died Tuesday

title: Lawyer: 29-year-old who posed as teen student was lonely
description: The lawyer for a 29-year-old woman accused of using false documents to enroll as a New Jersey high school student says she did so because she was lonely

title: What to know about the drug xylazine and why it's making fentanyl worse
description: DEA issues public safety alert for mixture of powerful veterinary drug with fentanyl

title: UK police: Suspect arrested after man set alight near mosque
description: Detectives in England are investigating an attack in which a man was set alight as he walked home from a mosque

title: Firefighters battle blaze at home owned by Sen. Warren's son
description: Firefighters battled an early morning blaze at a Massachusetts home owned by the son of U.S. Sen. Elizabeth Warren

title: Yellen says bank 'situation is stabilizing'
description: Treasury Secretary Yellen said Tuesday that "the situation is stabilizing and the U.S. banking system remains sound," in remarks to the American Bankers Association.

title: WATCH:  This coffee shop franchise is giving people with disabilities meaningful jobs
description: Bitty and Beau’s Coffee Shop, a café started by the parents of two children with Down syndrome, employs over 400 people with disabilities.

title: Dont'a Hightower retires from NFL after decade with Patriots
description: Dont’a Hightower is making a quiet exit to a memorable career with the New England Patriots

title: McCarthy again slams Manhattan DA in defense of Trump
description: McCarthy said he has not talked to Trump about the investigation: "I have not talked to the president, maybe three weeks?"

title: UN: Fresh gang violence in Haiti leaves 187 dead in 11 days
description: The U.N. says that new clashes between gangs in Haiti’s capital and beyond have killed at least 187 people in less than two weeks and injured more than 150 others

title: Supreme Court rules for deaf student in education case
description: The Supreme Court has ruled unanimously for a a deaf student who sued his public school system for providing an inadequate education

title: Gun used in kidnapping of Americans in Mexico allegedly came from US
description: A gun used earlier this month by cartel members to kidnap a group of Americans and kill two of them was illegally trafficked from the U.S.

title: Tom Hanks named Harvard's 2023 commencement speaker
description: Two-time Academy Award winning actor Tom Hanks has been named the principal speaker at Harvard’s commencement on May 25

title: Inmates escape jail after allegedly tunneling through cell wall
description: Two Virginia inmates are back in custody after they allegedly escaped from jail by tunneled through a cell wall, authorities said.

title: US home sales surged in February as mortgage rates dipped
description: Sales of previously occupied U.S. homes surged in February to the fastest pace in six months as homebuyers seized on a modest drop in mortgage rates and slight pullback in prices

title: Garbage: In Paris streets, heaps of it become protest symbol
description: Garbage

title: US speeds up Abrams tank delivery to Ukraine war zone
description: U.S. officials say the Pentagon is speeding up its delivery of Abrams tanks to Ukraine, opting to send a refurbished older model that can be ready faster

title: Newly released video shows deputies on top of Irvo Otieno, who died in police custody
description: Video showing in-custody death of Irvo Otieno is set to be released Tuesday.

title: Gwyneth Paltrow to stand trial for Deer Valley ski crash
description: Actress Gwyneth Paltrow goes on trial starting Tuesday in the Utah ski town of Park City where she is accused in a lawsuit of crashing into a skier during a 2016 family ski vacation, leaving him with brain damage and four broken ribs

title: US probes reports of steering glitch on newer Honda Civics
description: U.S. auto safety regulators are investigating complaints from Honda Civic drivers that their steering can stick, causing a momentary increase in effort and increasing the risk of a crash

title: Huge fire destroys New Jersey church, draws 150 firefighters
description: Fire has destroyed a large New Jersey church, collapsing its roof as more than 150 firefighters fought to control the blaze

title: Xi, Putin meeting highlights US tensions with China
description: Secretary of State Blinken called Xi's peacemaking talk on Ukraine a façade.

title: Biden to create national monuments in Nevada, Texas at conservation summit
description: President Joe Biden plans on Tuesday to announce the establishment of two new national monuments, protecting more than half a million acres of land.

title: Mountain lion attacks man from behind while he and his wife relaxed in hot tub
description: A man was attacked from behind by a mountain lion and suffered wounds to his head while he and his wife were relaxing in an in-ground hot tub.

title: 2 teens on spring break die in tragic sledding accident
description: A 17-year-old and an 18-year-old have died after suffering a tragic sledding accident while they were on spring break.

title: Man looking for deer antlers discovers human skeleton instead
description: A man made a grisly discovery over the weekend when he discovered a human skeleton while looking for shed deer antlers.

title: Asian stocks rise ahead of Fed's next interest rate decision
description: Asian stock markets are higher ahead of a Federal Reserve decision on another possible interest rate hike amid worries about global banks

title: Man’s attempt to kidnap child from school bus stop thwarted by group of kids: Police
description: An attempted kidnapping at a school bus stop went wrong for one 30-year-old man who was thwarted by a group of kids who came to the defense of one of their classmates.

title: WATCH:  Suspect flees LAPD officers on skateboard
description: After a suspect lost control of his pickup truck while being pursued by police in Los Angeles, he took off on his skateboard before finally being apprehended.

title: Los Angeles schools to close as district workers plan strike
description: Tens of thousands of workers in the Los Angeles Unified School District will walk off the job over stalled contract talks

title: Tennessee House OKs narrow abortion exemption bill
description: Tennessee’s GOP-dominant House has advanced legislation to add a narrow exemption to the state’s strict abortion ban

title: Biden signs measure nullifying DC criminal code revisions
description: President Joe Biden has signed into law legislation officially nullifying the recent overhaul of the District of Columbia criminal code

title: Russia to hold UN meeting on Ukraine kids taken to Russia
description: Russia plans to hold an informal meeting of the U.N. Security Council in early April on what it says is “the real situation” of Ukrainian children taken to Russia

title: No telling how much more snow coming for Sierra Nevada
description: A relentless winter at Lake Tahoe has now etched its way into the history books as the Sierra's second-snowiest on record

title: Miami Beach votes against new curfew restriction after fatal shootings
description: The City of Miami Beach voted against extending curfew restrictions, a day after the city imposed an overnight curfew for South Beach after multiple fatal shootings.
